org.displaytag.model

Class TableModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.displaytag.model.TableModel

  • public class TableModel
extends Object
    Table Model. Holds table data for presentation.
    Version:
    $Revision$ ($Author$)
    Author:
    Fabrizio Giustina
